name: Chill Runner
description:
Are you bored? All the videogames are too complex for being able to chill? Well then Chill Runner is for you, an endless runner without complex mechanics but fun.

(Please note that Chill Runner is a new game and is under constant development and every week there will be at least one update)

- Obstacles: 20 different types of obstascles

- Skins: 5 different types of skins

And much more...

(If you want to help please communicate us what we would have to develop, change, or fix)
